beers.name: Estrella
beers.description: Estrella Damm is a Mediterranean beer, made with malt, rice and hop, brewed with 100% natural ingredients according to the original recipe from 1876.

beers.name: Guinness
beers.description: Irish Dry Stout style beer brewed by Guinness Ltd. in Dublin, Ireland. Guinness stout is made from water, barley, roast malt extract, hops, and brewer's yeast.

beers.name: Galway Hooker
beers.description: Galway Hooker is an excellent example of a Pale Ale; very complex and well balanced, fully flavoured with a great finish making it a highly refreshing and more-ish beer

beers.name: Paulaner Hefe-Weissbier
beers.description: The distinctive fruity, cloves and spice aroma and flavour of Paulaner Hefe-Weissbier are derived from the use of 60% malted wheat, a speciality cultured yeast and traditional Hallertau valley hops. An excellent Bavarian wheat beer that is naturally cloudy, with yeasty aromas and a refreshing taste.

beers.name: London Pride
beers.description: Brewed under the watchful eye of our Griffin since the 1950s, London Pride is unmistakably London's beer. With its well-rounded flavour and rich history, everything about this authentic, characterful beer binds it to our capital city and the people who love it.
